doc:
Beth Lydy https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Beth_Lydy 0 Beth Lydy (born about 1896 — February 6, 1979), who also used the name Lyda Betti, was an American actress, operetta singer, writer, educator, and theatrical producer; she was the wife of violinist and broadcaster Eddy Brown. Beth_Lydy ( born about 1896 — February_6_,_1979 ) , who also used the_name_Lyda_Betti , was an_American_actress , operetta_singer , writer , educator , and theatrical_producer ; she was the_wife of violinist_and_broadcaster_Eddy_Brown .
